name: College Sex - Episode 1
description:
A visual novel series about the sex life of two college girls. In this episode, they just arrived at their dorm.

GAME DESCRIPTION
College Sex is a new visual novel series that follows the story of two attractive young women and their naughty experiences in college.
Episode 1 has as its main plot the arrival of Ivy and Jade in their dorm room.
Once they have unpacked their things, they start to get to know each other better.
Ivy quickly realizes that her new roommate is much more timid than her, but that doesn’t stop them from getting along.
What follows after that…we leave it to you to discover!
We promise you a steamy story with high-definitions graphics and realistic-looking characters.
